column4: I have i386 ver loaded on a x64 box.  is there a way to upgrade to x64?
why bother with most programs running in a 32bit environ. unless you really want to compile most everything
cuz I am running out of cpu doing live video encoding: check out my 5fps fish: http://giss.tv:8000/fsfs.ogg
link doesn't work.. but anyway.. not sure if it will help on 32bit in your situation but take a look at your swap space. You might need to increase it.
